name: GetMiroProjectInfo
description:
Retrieve information for a specific Miro project.

This tool retrieves information about a specific project in Miro, such as the project name. It is intended for users with Enterprise plans and requires the 'projects:read' scope. Use this tool when you need to view details of a specific project as an Enterprise user.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to retrieve project information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: team_id_for_project_info
parameters.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the project to retrieve information for.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the information.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to retrieve the project information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team from which you want to retrieve the project information.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the information.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the information.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
